Question: ^a Only one song is composed by this person in cooperation with Marcus Miller ("Theme For Augustine").
Hints: By age 16, this person was a member of the music society and playing professionally when not at school.
This group, which recorded in Philharmonic Hall for the album In Concert (1972), was unsatisfactory to this person.
This was the first of many recordings this person contributed to in this period, mostly as a sideman.
